install.name: AutoTweet NG Content-Extension
install.author: Ulli Storck
install.description: Extension plugin for AutoTweet. Inserts new content articles in the twitter timeline of a specified account. Needs AutoTweet NG Component to work!

param.name: @spacer5
param.default: Specify the articles to post in the following fields. The field conditions are connected by OR! (If nothing is set, all articles will be posted!).

param.name: section
param.label: Section
param.description: Select section which will be source of articles

param.name: category
param.label: Category
param.description: Select category which will be source of articles

param.name: sections
param.label: Section-IDs
param.description: Select sections which will be source of articles - IDs of sections separated by comma (e.g. 1,2,3,4,5)

param.name: categories
param.label: Categorie-IDs
param.description: Select categories which will be source of articles - IDs of categories separated by comma (e.g. 1,2,3,4,5)

param.name: @spacer6
param.default: Specify exclusions for article posting. Exclusions has priority over all other settings! (If fields are empty, nothing is excluded).

param.name: excluded_sections
param.label: Excluded Section-IDs
param.description: Select sections which will be excluded from posting - IDs of sections separated by comma (e.g. 1,2,3,4,5)

param.name: excluded_categories
param.label: Excluded Categorie-IDs
param.description: Select categories which will be excluded from posting - IDs of categories separated by comma (e.g. 1,2,3,4,5)

param.name: post_private
param.label: Post private articles
param.description: You can post private articles to twitter. Off course users have login to read the linked article.

param.name: post_modified
param.label: Post modified articles
param.description: You can post also modified (edited) articles. As default only new articles are posted to twitter.

param.name: show_catsec
param.label: Show section/category
param.description: You can show the section and/or category at the beginning of the twitter message. Remember: The message can have a maximum of 140 characters and will be truncated at the end!

param.name: use_text
param.label: Use title or text
param.description: If your titles are not good for posting to twitter you can also use the article text.
param.option: use message text for twitter message
use title and text for message

param.name: use_text_count
param.label: Number of chars to use
param.description: Enter the number of chars for use with twitter message (min. 10 max. 140 chars). Remember: A twitter message has not more than 140 chars and will be truncated. If you use static text (hashtags) or category/section names they also need space...

param.name: @spacer8
param.default: Advanced option: Additional text/hashtags for message.

param.name: static_text_source
param.label: Source for text
param.description: AutoTweet can insert metakey data automatically as hashtags in the twitter message (If no metakey data is available, AutoTweet uses also the static text if entered). Also you can use only a static text.
param.option: none, do not show additional text
use article metakey data as hashtags

param.name: metakey_count
param.label: Metakey count
param.description: Here you can enter how many metakey words (counted from left to right) should be used as hashtags, when you chose option 'use article metakey data as hashtags'

param.name: static_text
param.label: Static text
param.description: Here you can enter a static text that is inserted into the message, when you chose option 'use static text' or if no metakey data is available. Remember: If the position of the static text is at the end of the message text, it will be truncated if there are more then 140 chars.

param.name: static_text_pos
param.label: Position for text
param.option: show text/hashtags at the beginning of message text
show text/hashtags at the end of message text
